page.title: 15Severn Park
page.content: Severn Park is a large area of land which runs alongside the river Severn in Bridgnorth. Once an area of common land, it is now laid out so that visitors and townspeople alike can enjoy a large park like area in which to play games, have a picnic or sit and look at the scenic countryside. It is planned that in the future the river will be made navigable and there will be a number of pleasure craft on the water.The other side of the park is formed by the natural barrier of the High Rock and the continuation of the wooded slopes of the Hermitage Coppice. A favourite place for fishermen and photographers alike, this area attracts people from many miles away.
